Class ID3Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • ID3Node

  • public class ID3Node
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a data structure for the ID3 node in the Desicion tree. This node can calculate information gain and entropy of the node as well. It also be used to create the printing version of the tree. Created by Mohammad Etemad on 3/9/17.
